meanings: [명사] prediction, forecast, [동사] predict, foresee, forecast, (literary) foretell

vlive.korean: [한층 더 예측 불가능한 미션의 연속!] 있구나! [and the missions become more unpredictable!] There it is! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.7
vlive.english: [and the missions become more unpredictable!] There it is!

vlive.korean: [승자를 예측할 수 없는 팔씨름까지!] 시작! [Arm wrestling] Go! 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.4
[예측불허의 만남은 둘의 마음을 변하게 했을까?] [Will the unexpected date change how they feel?] View video 콬TV (WHYNOT) : 남녀 모두를 당황하게 한 한밤의 충격 고백!ㅣ[리얼하이로맨스S2] EP12
vlive.english: [Will the unexpected date change how they feel?]

vlive.korean: [그의 예측이 맞을지 지금 함께 보러 가볼까요?] - 달려라! - 방탄! [Shall we go check out how it unfolds?] - RUN! - BTS! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.87
vlive.english: [Shall we go check out how it unfolds?] - RUN! - BTS!

vlive.korean: 민기는 예측하기에는? How about yours, REN? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU'EST] 뉴이스트의 심야식당 - 오늘을 읽어주는 남자들 part.3

examples.korean: The government is forecasting an economic recovery. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 정부는 경제 회복을 예측하고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The government is forecasting an economic recovery. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Try and anticipate what the interviewers will ask. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 면접관들이 무엇을 물어볼지 예측해 보도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Try and anticipate what the interviewers will ask. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Cholesterol level is not a strong predictor of heart disease in women. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 콜레스테롤 수치는 여자들의 심장병에 대한 강한 예측 변수가 아니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Cholesterol level is not a strong predictor of heart disease in women. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Prices were predictably high. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 물가는 예측하던 대로 높았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Prices were predictably high. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Snow is forecast for tomorrow. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 내일은 눈이 내릴 것으로 예측됩니다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
